name: Natural Ranks
description:
SEARCH ENGINE OPTIMIZATION, GOOGLE ADWORDS, WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT AND PROJECT MANAGEMENT -  If we had to choose just four areas to specialize in, we'd choose these four, but we can also offer a number of other ancillary services such as SEO copywriting, SEO training, website design and public speaking. Natural Ranks is a partnership of two northern web monkeys, Christopher Hough and Graham Bowers. Graham Bowers is a search engine optimisation specialist based in Lancaster.
Having worked for a number of successful digital marketing companies since leaving University, Graham has over 10 years experience of optimising websites for the major UK search engines. In his career he has had the pleasure of working for the largest digital agency in Europe and was the lead SEO for many blue chip companies. Chris Hough is an online marketing expert and consultant with over 9 years of experience in website development and website optimisation. He has worked with a diverse range of brands across industries to improve their rankings in the major UK search engines, including Shell UK, Opodo, Co-op Travel, YesCarCredit and MoneySupermarket.com.
